input_documents: Yah Dhan Kiska Hai by Mahatma Ananda Swami Saraswati 1986 Delhi - Arya Sahitya Bhavan.pdf
metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Spaghetti Bolognese Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 carrot, grated 1 celery stalk, diced 1 can (28 ounces) crushed tomatoes 1/4 cup tomato paste 1/2 cup red wine (optional) 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 teaspoon dried basil Salt and pepper to taste Spaghetti for serving Grated Parmesan cheese for garnish Instructions: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. Greek Moussaka Ingredients: 2 large eggplants, sliced 1 pound ground lamb or beef 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 1/4 cup red wine 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1 teaspoon oregano 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 2 tablespoons olive oil Salt and pepper to taste 2 cups béchamel sauce Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Paella Ingredients: 1/2 pound chicken breast, cubed 1/2 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined 1/2 pound mussels, cleaned 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 bell pepper, diced 1 cup short-grain rice 2 cups chicken broth 1/2 cup white wine 1/4 cup olive oil 1 teaspoon saffron 1 teaspoon paprika Salt and pepper to taste Lemon wedges for garnish Instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.

Pasta Salad Ingredients: 2 cups cooked pasta (such as rotini or penne) 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 1/2 cup cucumber, diced 1/4 cup black olives, sliced 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: In a large bowl, combine the pasta, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta cheese. Mediterranean Chickpea Salad Ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved 1/2 cucumber, diced 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 tablespoon lemon juice Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry Ingredients: 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced 1/2 cup broccoli florets 1/4 cup snap peas 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 teaspoon sesame oil Cooked rice for serving Instructions: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.

Rfissa Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon ginger o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil o 4 cups chicken broth o 1/4 cup lentils o 1/4 cup cilantro o 4 pieces flatbread Instructions: o Sauté chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned. Risotto Ingredients: o 1 cup Arborio rice o 4 cups chicken broth o 1/2 cup white wine o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese o 2 tablespoons butter o 1 tablespoon olive oil Instructions: o Heat broth in a pot and keep warm. Sopa de Tortilla Ingredients: o 4 corn tortillas o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 4 cups chicken broth o 2 tomatoes o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 avocado o 1/4 cup cilantro Instructions: o Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy.

Butter Chicken Ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cubed 1 cup plain yogurt 1 tablespoon lemon juice 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 teaspoon grated ginger 1 teaspoon garam masala 1 teaspoon turmeric 1 teaspoon cumin 1 can (14.5 ounces) tomato puree 1/2 cup heavy cream 2 tablespoons butter Salt and pepper to taste Chopped cilantro for garnish Cooked rice or naan for serving Instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and cumin. Chili Con Carne Ingredients: 1 pound ground beef 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans, drained 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 1/4 cup tomato paste 1 cup beef broth 1 tablespoon chili powder 1 teaspoon cumin 1 teaspoon paprika Salt and pepper to taste Shredded cheese and sour cream for garnish Instructions: In a large pot, cook ground beef with diced onion and garlic over medium heat until browned. Vegetable Lasagna Ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles, cooked 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 zucchini, sliced 1 bell pepper, diced 1 cup spinach, chopped 1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce 1 can (15 ounces) ricotta cheese 1 egg 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 2 tablespoons olive oil Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).

Mandu Ingredients: o 1 package dumpling wrappers o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage o 1/4 cup chopped green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 teaspoon sesame oil o Oil for frying Instructions: o Mix ground pork, cabbage, green onions, minced garlic, soy sauce, and sesame o Place a spoonful of filling on each wrapper and fold to seal. Mapo Tofu Ingredients: o 1 block tofu o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 tablespoon chili bean paste o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon rice wine o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1/4 cup chicken broth o 1 tablespoon cornstarch o 1/4 cup chopped green onions Instructions: o Cut tofu into cubes and set aside. Pad Thai Ingredients: o 8 ounces rice noodles o 1/2 pound shrimp o 2 eggs o 1 cup bean sprouts o 1/4 cup peanuts o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1 tablespoon lime juice o 1/4 cup green onions Instructions: o Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened, then drain.
